full_summary:
# M2989-242734A - Patrol Vessel (PV) Inkster - Drydocking and Refit

## Publication Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4330346253-Doc4385719607
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4330346253
* **Publication Date**: January 12, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: February 28, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Cancellation Notice**: This tender was cancelled

## Procurement Category and Method

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (G and S)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Sourcing Requirements

* **Area of Origin**: Suppliers in Western Canada
* **Sourcing Strategy**: Suppliers in Western Canada only

## Services Required

* **Scope of Work**: Docking and refit of the Patrol Vessel (PV) Inkster
* **Contract Start Date**: February 16, 2024
* **Contract End Date**: December 31, 2024
* **Work Commencement Date**: March 1, 2024
* **Work Completion Date**: August 30, 2024

## Request for Proposal

* **Request Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Bid
* **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Tracy Birtwistle
* **Contact Email**: tracy.birtwistle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18481657?extsite=MTg0ODE2NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18481657?extsite=MTg0ODE2NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Notice Terms

* **Optional Bidders’ Conference and Site Visit**: None
* **Bidder Instructions**: Consult Part 2 of the bid document
* **Disclosure of Required Information**: Only suppliers from Western Canada will be considered in this tender. 
* **Justification for Limitation of Bidder Opportunity**: None provided. 
* **Note to Supliers**: Ships from Western Canada only will be considered for this fifteen-million dollar contract.
